### Testing implications of sampling proportional to node degree

```{r}
df_nodes %>%
  select(name, outdeg) %>%
  mutate(
    pr=outdeg/sum(outdeg),
  ) -> tmp

samp = sample(tmp$name, 1000, replace=FALSE, prob=tmp$pr)

df_edges %>%
  mutate(
    idx=1:n()
  ) %>%
  filter(
    from %in% samp
  ) %>%
  summarize(mean(idx))
```
